# Banuta base floor
# Start it at depot!
setMeleeKill carniphila
setMeleeKill wasp
setMeleeKill bug
setMeleeKill terror bird
setMeleeKill centipede
setMeleeKill snake
setMeleeKill cave rat
setMeleeKill spider
setMeleeKill cobra
setMeleeKill crocodile
setMeleeKill swamp troll
setMeleeKill merlkin
setMeleeKill sibang
setMeleeKill kongra
# Set health potion id here
fastExiva _hppotion = 0A 01
setBot LootAll=1
# Set things you do NOT want to consider loot
setLoot $_hppotion$
setLoot 03 0E
setLoot 02 0E
setLoot EE 00
:depotpart
move 32622,32746,7
putLootOnDepot
move 32622,32746,7
IfEnoughItemsGoto $_hppotion$,20,$nlineoflabel:continueit$
fastExiva pause
waitX 1
:continueit
move 32623,32751,7
move 32627,32751,7
move 32630,32751,7
move 32636,32751,7
move 32637,32748,7

:banutastart

move 32768,32578,7
# check cap and potions
IfFewItemsGoto $_hppotion$,20,$nlineoflabel:todepot$
IfTrue ($mycap$#number<=#5000) Goto $nlineoflabel:todepot$
gotoScriptLine $nlineoflabel:banutastart$
:todepot
# start walking to depot
